page.title: 16ATTITUDES IN CHARLTON KINGS
page.content: WE INTERVIEWED PEOPLE IN THE STREETS AND SUMMARISED THEIR MAJORITY VIEWS ON CURRENT NEWS. {DRUGS.}DRUG TAKING FOR NON-MEDICIAL REASONS IS SEEN AS A SERIOUS NATIONAL PROBLEM.ESPECIALLY WORRYING ARE COCAINE,HEROIN AND CANABIS.ALL CIGARETTE ADVERTISING SHOULD BE BANNED AND THE MINIMUM LEGAL AGE FOR SMOKING RASIED FROM 16 TO 18 YEARS. {COMPUTERS.}THESE ARE SEEN AS USEFUL AND INTERESTING.ALL CHIDREN SHOULD USE THEM AT HOME AND SCHOOL. {PUNKS.}ADULTS THOUGHT PUNKS WERE NOT SENSIBLE,WERE HARMLESS AND TO BE AVOIDED.CHIDREN THOUGHT THEY WERE NOT SENSIBLE, FRIENDLY,NOR TRUSTWORTHY AND WERE DANGEROUS.ADULTS PREFERRED TO JUDGE PUNK'S HONESTY AND FRIENDLINESS BY THEIR ACTIONS AND NOT GENERALISE. EVERYONE THOUGHT PUNK HAIRSTYLES AND CLOTHES SHOULDN'T BE ALLOWED IN SCHOOL
